title: Global Day of Coderetreat 2013 - Kassel, Germany
description:
The Global Day of Coderetreat 2013 in Kassel is held at the IBM Office. THere are 25 spaces. Please use Eventbrite to register. 
 
The (german) Poster GDCR 2013 Kassel (http://api.ning.com/files/-K5gsOBQUIMnTPitT-gFLL0bA-2RbWLpcSgjETWz13bpDa8eaKNq6hZIWMpS8pbpYzE9ZnTb3mM8y*PNLH8t1-n5eiKDUOaB/PosterGlobalDayofCodeRetreat2013.pdf) 
Feel free to distribute an share :-)
